title: guru vara mahimala
sahitya:
guruvara mahimala nEmani bhuvilO koniyADudurA

anupallavi

 tiruvaiyAranu puramuna velasina hari bhakta-grEsarulaku tyAgarAja

caraNam 1

 ninnarEyi nA svapnamu nanduna pannuka vEncEsi 
mannana tODa mAdhavu paramugA konni krtulu jatagUrccumanina shrI
 
caraNam 2

 nArada muni karuNaku pAtruDaTa vArata brahmamaTa 
sAramaina gAnAmrta rasamucE sarvEshvaruni santOSa paracunaTa
 
caraNam 3

 rAmacandra bhakta rAjIva sudhArasa pAnuData 
rAmacandrapuravara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavatula bhAgyOdayamaTa
